    • Method Detail

      • connections

        public java.lang.String[] connections()
        Returns an unsorted array of the current stored connections.

      • events

        public java.lang.String[] events()
        Returns an unsorted array of the current stored event JSON strings.

      • eventsList

        public java.util.List<wigzo.android.sdk.Event> eventsList()
        Returns a list of the current stored events, sorted by timestamp from oldest to newest.

      • isEmptyConnections

        public boolean isEmptyConnections()
        Returns true if no connections are current stored, false otherwise.

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(java.lang.String str)
        Adds a connection to the local store.
        Parameters:
        str - the connection to be added, ignored if null or empty

      • removeConnection

        public void removeConnection(java.lang.String str)
        Removes a connection from the local store.
        Parameters:
        str - the connection to be removed, ignored if null or empty, or if a matching connection cannot be found

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String key,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> segmentation,
            int timestamp,
            int hour,
            int dow,
            int count,
            double sum)
        Adds a custom event to the local store.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the custom event, required, must not be the empty string
        segmentation - segmentation values for the custom event, may be null
        timestamp - timestamp (seconds since 1970) in GMT when the event occurred
        hour - current local hour on device
        dow - current day of the week on device
        count - count associated with the custom event, should be more than zero
        sum - sum associated with the custom event, if not used, pass zero. NaN and infinity values will be quietly ignored.

      • removeEvents

        public void removeEvents(java.util.Collection<wigzo.android.sdk.Event> eventsToRemove)
        Removes the specified events from the local store. Does nothing if the event collection is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        eventsToRemove - collection containing the events to remove from the local store

      • getPreference

        public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves a preference from local store.
        Parameters:
        key - the preference key

      • setPreference

        public void setPreference(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Adds a preference to local store.
        Parameters:
        key - the preference key
        value - the preference value, supply null value to remove preference
